lead_paragraph: Fiat has its owns means if it decides to seek a majority stake of Chrysler, and has no intention of selling its Ferrari unit to raise funds, the chief executive said Thursday, David Jolly writes in The New York Times.
snippet: Fiat has its owns means if it decides to seek a majority stake of Chrysler, and has no intention of selling its Ferrari unit to raise funds, the chief executive said Thursday.

headline.main: Fiat Denies Reports It May Sell Ferrari

abstract: Fiat has its owns means if it decides to seek a majority stake of Chrysler, and has no intention of selling its Ferrari unit to raise funds, the chief executive said Thursday.
